channel.title: Project2006
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HfXJE.png[/img][/center]
[center]Project 2006[/center]
How it came about? I thought of the good days back when Runescape was fun. I noticed some of these old-school servers never being finished. They would have a great start but would never finish and open for beta testing etc. This server I hope to be different, I hope to put this server at it's full potential. If you're interested in joining this project and have the same interest in old-school Runescape as I do. Feel free to join the project.
What source? I'm using Hyperion.
Now selling @project2006.org emails [COLOR=Lime]$3.00[/COLOR] each.
[email]teh_service@live.com[/email]
[B][COLOR=DarkOrange][B][COLOR=black][URL=http://"http://project2006.org/forum/"]Forums[/URL][/COLOR][/B] are up, they're temporary but they're up![/COLOR][/B]
[size=18pt][b]Development team[/b][/size]
Overall developer - Myself Server coder/web development - John Web/server developer - rspsplanet
[size=12pt]All updates will be found[/size] [url=http://project2006.org/Blog/][size=14pt][b]HERE[/b][/size][/url] [size=12pt]on our blog from now on[/size]
[b][size=24pt]Youtube videos: [/size][/b]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I_5XuF_y9wU&feature=channel_video_title][b]Runecrafting[/b][/url]
[size=18pt]Media[/size]

item.title: Project2006
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:12, topic:399229”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=496363.msg3629197#msg3629197 date=1308076041]

I’m starting to get annoyed by all the 2006-2007 remakes. Anyways goodluck.

Then don’t look at them, at least their attempting to bring something back whether it fail or not.

OT: Good luck with the development mate, I hope this one is successful and comes to a nice outcome, I’ll be back to check this out soon.
[/quote]

It’s hard not to look at them when they occupy the entire forum. And the only one i’ve noticed actually going anywhere is RSVaults.http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489018.0.html[/quote]

Because all of his content was already finished. All he had to do was tidy it up a bit. He’ll also never have a good website. x]

cough sorry vaulty cough

Read full topic

item.title: Project2006
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

vManlyMan:

It’s hard not to look at them when they occupy the entire forum. And the only one i’ve noticed actually going anywhere is RSVaults.http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489018.0.html

I’ve seen about half of this board and development teams being something along the lines of using DSPK, Project-Insanity, or Hybrid PvP. I don’t see that many RuneScape remakes ever so often nowadays. Nonetheless, if you don’t want to look at the “obnoxious” amount of remakes attempting to make a remake of RuneScape then don’t look at them?

Read full topic
